title: Chalk’it: dataflow and drag-and-drop Python dashboarding
description: Chalk'it is an open-source framework that helps to convert Python scripts into shareable web application dashboards. It relies on drag-and-drop widget design to build an interface connected to a dataflow that ties together Python code and other data sources.
